parameters.p180_ice:
ice crystal backscatter phase function, used to generate beta_a via beta_a_backscat/p180_ice
if set to an invalid or non-finite value, will use measured beta_a.
parameters.h2o_depol_threshold: linear depolarization threshold, linear_depol<threshold identified as liquid
parameters.alpha_water: size distribution shape parameter alpha for liquid
parameters.g_water: size distribution parameter g for liquid
parameters.alpha_ice: size distribution shape parameter alpha for ice
parameters.g_ice: size distribution parameter g for ice
parameters.type: A name for your distribution type
parameters.Dr: maximum radius of an ice crystal
parameters.sigma_a: projected area of ice crystal = sigma_a*(pi/4)*D^delta_a
parameters.delta_a1: delta_a for projected area where D < Dr
parameters.delta_v1: delta_v for volume where D < Dr
parameters.delta_a2: delta_a for projected area where D >= Dr
parameters.delta_v2: delta_v for volume where D >= Dr
